basic_info.name: BEC Guntur Admissions
description: For selection to the B.Tech course, candidates have to take either the AP EAMCET or JEE Main.
Selection to the M.Sc course is based on merit.
Candidates who have cleared the eligibility criteria for M.Tech have to take the AP PGECET or the GATE to be selected for the course.
For selection in the MCA course, candidates have to take the AP ICET exam.

basic_info.name: How to Apply?
description: To apply for admission, the candidates must visit the official website of the respective exam conducting authority. Students can only apply online.

Registration for AP EAMCET starts in February, while that for AP PGECET starts in early March. Applications for AP ICET are typically available from March to mid-April. JEE Main is conducted twice a year; the registrations take place from April to May, and September to November. GATE registrations take place from September to October.
Read More: BEC Guntur Admissions

basic_info.name: BEC Guntur Placements
description: The Training & Placement Cell is committed to provide all possible assistance to the graduate and post-graduate students to secure employment in multinational companies and other reputed organizations and industries.

The Training & Placement Cell extends its services round the year and facilitates to establish contacts between companies and students. This Cell helps the students to improve skills in related fields (soft skills, resume preparation, practice for interviews, etc) and career guidance. Frequently this cell conducts a number of mock tests to improve the performance in written examinations. The aim is to ensure that students have the information and skills necessary for an effective job search.

Bapatla Engineering College has an impressive placement record. Its Computer Science and Engineering department and Mechanical Engineering department lead in this field. 75% students of Computer Science and 87% students of mechanical branch get placed easily. The highest package that has been offered is near 8 lakh rupees per year. The recruiters include companies like IBM, Wipro, Trimax, Cognizant and Tata Consultancy Services.
Read More: BEC Guntur Placements

basic_info.name: BEC Guntur Facilities
description: Library: Acclaimed as the one of the biggest Libraries with 22,000 sq. ft. area in the State, The Central Library of BEC has been playing a vital role as Information Centre catering to the Academic and learning needs of the faculty and Students alike since inception. The facility is serving the student fraternity ranging from undergraduate to Masters and ultimately aiding the Research stratum of Bapatla Engineering College.

Bank: BEC is provided with a State Bank of India that saves time and energies of students and staff to conduct monetary transactions. The students can pay their college fees of various kinds in this extension centre without a need to travel back to the bank in the town. The SBI has added to a new facility to BEC students by providing ONLINE banking facility enabling them with 24/7 access to Banking services

Food Court: A hygienic, well-furnished and well-equipped canteen is available in the campus to provide food at subsidized rates for the staff and students. Purified drinking water is supplied in the college, hostel and canteen

Transportation: The college has been providing a commuting facility to its staff and students with notable subsidized fares. The transportation facility is handled with an efficient fleet of 11 buses punctually running from Bapatla to College from morning to late evening on all working days.

Post Office: The college campus also houses a post office to cater to the mail needs of students and staff. The students can save their precious time by using services of this on campus post office to send applications for higher education and mailing DDs and other allied postal services
Sports: spacious playgrounds and other amenities for diverse sports such as cricket, tennis, volleyball, basketball, shuttle badminton etc., and athletics are made available on the campus.
Other facilities: -

faqs.question: What is the placement scenario at Bapatla Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Considerable numbers of students of our college are getting selected every year in campus placements. About 75-80% of the students get either placements or secure admission for higher studies (M.Tech. within the country at IITs and other reputed institutes or M.S. in foreign universities) every year.

faqs.question: Does Bapatla Engineering College offer scholarships?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, the college does not offer any scholarships for the students, but it offers education loans for the students in need of it.

faqs.question: What are the accreditations of Bapatla Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.The College has been approved by the AICTE(All India Council for Technical Education) and the UGC(University Grants Commission). It is affiliated to Acharya Nagarjuna University and was established in 1981.

faqs.question: Does the college consist of a Center of Excellence?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Siemens center is an epitome of international standard software for design, modeling, analysis, manufacturing and project management. The students get trained and work on NX 8, Solid Edge, and FEMAP with NASTRAN, CAM Express, Tecnomatix-RobCAD, Team Centre and ProgeCAD. Qualified students will be listed in Siemensâ€™ web site used for international placement.

faqs.question: Is the infrastructure good?
faqs.answer: Ans.The College is housed on a spacious and well-planned 30 acre site with buildings of a total plinth area of about 6 lakh sq. ft. and widely acknowledged to be a harmonious blend of aesthetics and functional utility. The cost of buildings is over Rs.25.0 crores while that of the laboratory equipment comes to Rs.23.51 crores.

Section.name: About BEC Guntur
Section.description:
The Bapatla Engineering College is an Autonomous institution and is one of the seven educational institutions that are sponsored by the Bapatla Education Society. It is affiliated to Acharya Nagarjuna University and was established in 1981 with a vision to impart quality technical education.
The college offers B.Tech. Programmes in 8 branches of Engineering. Admission to the B.Tech. program can be done through AP-EAMCET or JEE Main.
Candidates seeking admission to the M.Tech. program have to appear for the AP PGECET or the GATE to be selected for the course. Admission to the M.Sc. program is granted on the basis of merit.
Admission to MCA will be granted solely on the basis of the candidateâ€™s performance in AP-ICET.
The college has great Infrastructure facilities and competent Human Resources and BEC is named as one of the best institutions in Andhra Pradesh. BEC is the first college that is offering Virtual classrooms and E-Classrooms for the students.
Every year a lot of companies visit our campus to recruit our students. They were inspired by the collegeâ€™s unique infrastructure and qualities. The college placement committee is aware about Current Industry trends and are training the students to adapt the same.
